project.name: PackageMapper
project.tags: website online active ruby rails google-maps sql
project.text: packagemapper 2005-11-24 packagemapper traces your fedex, ups, and usps package routes on a map. i built it for personal and family use; you re welcome to use it for as long as it stays up. website online active ruby rails google-maps sql

project.name: Flash Troll Generator
project.tags: fun website online flash python hmm
project.text: flash troll generator 2005-10-13 flash troll generator is a timesaving tool for flash-haters. mentions of flash always draw the same response; it seemed a shame to waste humans on writing them. fun website online flash python hmm

project.name: Storybase
project.tags: website online children ruby rails sql rdf foaf
project.text: storybase 2005-04 storybase is a user-editable ontology of stories and characters. it stores an rdf-like ontology of entities and relations. website online children ruby rails sql rdf foaf

project.name: html2db
project.text: html2db 2004 laszlo systems, inc. html2db.xsl converts an xhtml source document into a docbook output document. it provides features for customizing the generation of the output, so that the output can be tuned by annotating the source, rather than hand-editing the output. this makes it useful in a processing pipeline where the source documents are maintained in html, although it can be used as a one-time conversion tool too. this was written as part of the openlaszlo doc pipeline. html docbook openlaszlo download xslt

project.name: OpenLaszlo Platform
project.tags: openlaszlo download website major platform flash ajax ria active java javascript python
project.text: openlaszlo platform 2001-2005 laszlo systems, inc. an open source platform for creating zero-install web applications with the user interface capabilities of desktop client software. openlaszlo download website major platform flash ajax ria active java javascript python flash

project.name: wp-static-preview
project.text: wp-static-preview 2004 static-preview.php allows you to preview files that you edit on your server s filesystem, without storing them in the wordpress database. it is intended for the case where you have access to the file system of your web server or a staging server capable of running php. it allows you to use a text editor such as emacs to edit a file in one window and preview the results in another window. this gives you more full-featured editing than the web browser, and a faster edit-preview workflow cycle than copying between a text editor and and the wordpress writing web form. wordpress download php php

project.name: AlphaMask Graphics Library
project.text: alphamask graphics library 1999-2001 alphamask, inc. a cross-platform 2d graphics and rendering library that was acquired by openwave. [wayback 1, wayback 2] graphics major library c++

project.name: Method Game Engine
project.text: method game engine 1999 method software, inc. an online multiplayer roleplaying game with artifical agents. this included one of the first scheme interpreters in java. [wayback] java games java

project.name: Apple Dylan

project.name: Quickdraw GX
project.text: quickdraw gx 1989-1992 apple computer, inc. a graphics rendering and geometry engine that shipped with macos 7. historical macintosh apple graphics c

project.name: Frost and Fire
project.tags: historical macos graphics java applet c assembly
project.text: frost and fire 1999 a program that simulated video feedback. i licensed this as a screen saver for after dark. this technique is now a staple of media player audio visualizations. historical macos graphics java applet java c assembly

project.name: Sandpaper
project.text: sandpaper 1989-1991 a test bed for manipulating virtual textures, haptically rendered with a force-feedback joystick. this was my wife s thesis work; i created the software system. macintosh academic force-feedback c

project.name: Storyspace
project.text: storyspace 1987 riverrun storyspace was a hypertext authoring and viewing environment, before the web. i implemented a hypertext text editor for it.the company and program still exist; i would be amazed (and horrified) if it still used any of my code. historical macintosh hypertext pascal

project.name: Tiles
project.text: tiles 1989 using duals to tile the plane with octagons, pentagons, and other interesting patterns. i originally implemented this as a macintosh program; the version here is a more recent port to java. macintosh java applet c java

project.name: Ancient Macintosh Programs
project.text: ancient macintosh programs 1984-1989 menu editor was a wysiwyg tool for editing macos menus. menu madness was an investigation some alternate styles for macos menu layout and appearance. spheres was a port of the sun screen saver to macos. dragger was a startup extension (init) that implemented solid and translucent window dragging. tiles and truchet were mathematical visualizations. historical macintosh c assembly

project.name: Pogo Joe
project.text: pogo joe 1984 screenplay, inc. an award-winning arcades game for the commodore 64. historical commodore-64 game assembly
